Renata leads PayPalâ€™s efforts in business development on the consumer side of the business. She is currently involved in developing PayPalâ€™s strategy in the micropayments and social media space. Renata has over 10 years of experience in business development, strategy, product management and marketing. Prior to PayPal, she ran marketing and product management at Pictage, the leading online services provider for professional photographers.

Renata holds a BA and MEng from the University of Oxford (England) and an MBA from the Harvard Business School.
